title: 8135 Macomb St
posting_body: Come see this newly renovated 1 bed 1 bath apartment today!
Located in the heart of Grosse Ile on Macomb St.
This apartment is stand alone, which means all exterior walls are not connected to any other residents.
As you walk through the front door you're welcomed into the spacious kitchen with all new cabinets, counter tops, and appliances which leads you into the large living room with the full bath.
The bedroom is large with endless natural light and closet space.
Must make 3x the rent in gross income.
Background and past eviction checks will be ran.
